thread.title: CA OKs trade, agriculture chiefs’ appointments
thread.title_full: CA OKs trade, agriculture chiefs’ appointments

author: rmaricuelo
title: CA OKs trade, agriculture chiefs’ appointments
text:
By: Maila Ager - Reporter / @MAgerINQ INQUIRER.net / 02:10   
The Commission on Appointments (CA) confirmed on Wednesday the ad interim appointments of Agriculture Secretary Emmanuel Piñol and Trade Secretary Ramon Lopez. 
No member of the CA objected when separate motions were filed in the plenary, endorsing the confirmation of the two Cabinet members. 
Unlike the two, Justice Secretary Vitaliano Aguirre II failed to reach the plenary after the CA’s committee on justice and judicial and bar council decided to defer his confirmation pending opposition by Senator Antonio Trillanes IV. ADVERTISEMENT
